title: How to fix my phone's sensor - Quora

response.answer_text: 2 answers : You don't there is nothing fixable in a phone, besides changing the screen or the battery, you can't do nothing.Describe your problem more precisely, because phone's sensor are not known for failing. ( problem, phone brand/model… )
It depends on what phone model and what sensor you think is faulty. You can check out The Free Repair Manual for guides on repairing most phones.
